reviewHighlights.text: Pang Adventures, developed and published by Dotemu, is a vibrant modern reimagining of the classic arcade series that once captured the hearts of play...
Feels pretty true to the classic Pomping World and Super Buster Bros. I was very pleased it was available for PC as I don't leave my PC Engine Duo RX...
